sentences.en: At its best this is only a half satisfactory expedient.
sentences.cn: 这种办法充其量只能作为不完全令人满意的权宜之计.
权宜处置,怎么方便就怎么办.

sentences.en: Einstein found it expedient to use in the creation of his theories.
sentences.cn: 爱因斯坦发现这种本性在他理论的创建中是有用的.

sentences.en: Every kind of expedient was devised by our friends.
sentences.cn: 我们的朋友想出了各种各样的应急办法.

sentences.en: I cut my purchases dramatically by the simple expedient of destroying my credit cards.
sentences.cn: 通过销毁信用卡这一简单的权宜之计，我大幅削减了自己的购物支出。

sentences.en: I fear it was wrong, though expedient.
sentences.cn: 恐怕这是不对的, 虽然只好这样.

sentences.en: I thought it expedient to tell her about it.
sentences.cn: 我认为将此事告诉她为好.

sentences.en: Income controls were used only as a short - term expedient.
sentences.cn: 采用控制收入的办法只是作为一时的权宜之计.

sentences.en: It is expedient that he should go away at once!
It is expedient that he should go.
It is expedient to leave this reasoning process for a while.
sentences.cn: 暂时先搁下这个推理过程是有益的.

sentences.en: It was expedient to retire gracefully.
sentences.cn: 体面的让步可算是权宜之计.

sentences.en: Moore escaped by the simple expedient of lying down in a clump of grass.
sentences.cn: 穆尔急中生智，躺倒在草丛中得以脱身。

sentences.en: Morality, for his, means doing what is expedient.
sentences.cn: 对他来说, 道德就是选方便的事做.

sentences.en: The disease was controlled by the simple expedient of not allowing anyone to leave the city.
sentences.cn: 通过禁止任何人出城的简单应急办法使疾病得到了控制。

sentences.en: The story was a temporary expedient.
sentences.cn: 这个借口是临时的应急之法。

sentences.en: This solution is politically expedient but may well cause long-term problems.
sentences.cn: 这种解决方法是政治上的权宜之计，但会引起长远的问题。

trans.tran_cn: 应急有效的，权宜之计的，方便的，便利的，有利的
trans.tran_en: helping you to deal with a problem quickly and effectively although sometimes in a way that is not morally right
a quick and effective way of dealing with a problem
